entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Charlottetown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:45 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlottetown Airport 7:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: SW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming north 20 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow or ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning then changing to ice pellets in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
